Paterson's Disciple Bacon:
The Sea of Spores... It was only a matter of time before it spread.
I ran all the way to the barrier, fearing for my life. I had to leave all of my research behind.
While I was running for my life, I heard a sound that I could never forget. I didn't know what it was at the time, but I found out after when I was speaking to Jamon.
